translations: 救济方法；解决方法；治疗，疗法，药品（remedy 的复数）
补救，改正（remedy 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: The homeopath will test various strengths of remedies on the patient.
sentences.translation: 采用顺势疗法的医生将对病人试验疗法的各种效力。

sentences.sentence: There are a number of well-tried remedies which are perfectly safe to take.
sentences.translation: 有许多经过试验证明效果良好且安全的治疗方法。

sentences.sentence: The leaves, bark and sap are also common ingredients of local herbal remedies.
sentences.translation: 树叶、树皮和树液也是当地草药疗法的常用药材。
